dao.name: QRY_CUST_MN_PERS_DT
dao.statement: select 'n' primary_pers, cust_idx.alt_nam, cust_mn_pers_dt.dept_nam, cust_mn_pers_dt.role_cod, cust_mn_pers_dt.job_sta, cust_idx.mobile_nos, cust_idx.office_tel, cust_idx.home_tel, cust_idx.fax_nos, cust_idx.e_mail, cust_mn_pers_dt.remark, cust_mn_pers_dt.quit_dat, cust_idx.sex_typ, cust_idx.birth_dat, cust_mn_pers_dt.seq_nos from cust_mn_pers_dt left join cust_idx on cust_mn_pers_dt.athena_id = cust_idx.athena_id where cust_mn_pers_dt.per_cust_cod = cust_idx.cust_cod and cust_idx.from_table = 'CUST_MN_PERS_DT' and cust_mn_pers_dt.athena_id = :athena_id and cust_mn_pers_dt.cust_cod = :cust_cod
